cells.data:
Will use region proposal module
[Faste RCNN implementation](https://github.com/jwyang/faster-rcnn.pytorch)
- `cd utilities`
- `git clone https://github.com/jwyang/faster-rcnn.pytorch.git`
- `mv faster-rcnn.pytorch faster_rcnn_pytorch`
- `cd faster_rcnn_pytorch`
- `touch __init__.py`
- `pip install -r requirements.txt`

Now, for the `make.sh`, make sure to `export PATH=$PATH:/usr/bin/cuda/`.

[Facebook Implementation](https://github.com/facebookresearch/maskrcnn-benchmark)

Installation instructions: https://github.com/facebookresearch/maskrcnn-benchmark/blob/master/INSTALL.md
Remember to `conda install cython`.

conda environment `maskrcnn_benchmark`
